segments.text: I notice the kitchen's warm light from the open window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, towel in hand, drying her plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's completely unaware of the water gushing from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's spilling over, ruining the floor and cabinets slowly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle tugs at my heartâ€” she'll slip soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the children, they're climbing for cookies secretly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that teetering stool, so dangerously high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What if he falls and gets hurt? It breaks my heart.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so eager, but this could end badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're breaking rules, taking cookies without asking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful garden view contrasts this sad indoor neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel sorry for the potential accidents no one's preventing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene just makes me wish for more attention here.
segments.speaker: PAR
